short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch your curent tab as a FramelessApp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
External Frameless Window for any site!

* No Browser Elements!
* Window resizes.
* Fullscreen.

This will convert any site you are visiting to an external window without nearly all of the normal browser elements.
